'''14w34b''' is the fiftieth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.8]], released on August 18, 2014,<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20140822005833/https://mojang.com/2014/08/minecraft-snapshot-14w34a/|title=Minecraft snapshot 14w34d|website=Mojang.com|author=[[Dinnerbone]]}}</ref> to fix some bugs and crashes from [[14w34a]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=14w34b|prefix=Minecraft
|;dev
|59851|Rabbits are watching the player permanently.
|65591|Changing armor and heads on armor stands in spectator mode.
|67873|Bunnies react to players in Creative.
|67936|Tamed rabbits teleport to player after switching to spectator mode.
|67915|<code>written_book</code> item page text not backward-compatible with v1.7 saves.
|;previous
|67974|Crash when reaching y{{=}}254.
|67976|Cannot place armor stands.
|67981|Furnace inventory is not being updated correctly / Furnace is generally unusable.
|67983|<code>Hopper: java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking block entity</code>.
}}</onlyinclude>

== Trivia ==
* 14w34b was previously removed from the [[launcher]] for some time, but was added back in September 2018.
